This API returns transactions for the given date range. When connecting to Evertec CORE following parameters are required x-AuthType, x-AuthCredentials, CustPermId, and CustAcctType. For pagination, Evertec CORE requires RecCursor and FIS CORE requires PageNumber.
This API returns current account information

get.summary: This service domain orchestrates a consumer checking/demand deposit account. The typical range of services and fees covers payments and deposits, standing orders, sweeps, liens, check and debit card access.\n\nThis REST service is a merge candidate, which retrieves the account details for the given IdaAccount/ UsavAcct

PersonInfo.description: Personal Information, Contact Information, Economic Data

SecretQuestion.description: Security Question - configured by customer for identification purpose
SecretQuestion.example: Who is your best sports person ?

SecretAnswer.description: Security Question Answer - configured by customer for identification purpose

CardPlasticAcctStatusCode.description: Card Status Code - Check additional documentation

StatusModBy.description: Status Modified By - NOT IN USE

CardholderType.description: Card Holder Type - Check additional documentation

CardAcctId.description: Contains attributes for uniquely identifying a Card Account

SectionInd.description: Section indicator. This can take the following values  * C (Checking)  * S (Savings)  * R (Reserve)

DepAcctId.description: Contains attributes for uniquely identifying a Deposit Account

CheckingInd.description: Checking Acct Indicator.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

SavingsInd.description: Savings Acct Indicator.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

ReserveInd.description: Reserve Acct Indicator.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

ManageCd.description:
The account manage is composed of 3 bytes.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.
Each byte has a meaning:
O-AM5A-ACCT-SECTIONS-IND - indicates the section the account can manage.
1- chk + rsv + sav
2- chk + rsv
3- chk
4 sav
W-AM5A-ACCT-FUNDS-MANAGE-IND - indicates how the reserve funds will be manage and the order between sections.
0 - no manage
1 - automatic manage by system
2 - manage by the client
The order for 0 and 2 is chk - rsv - sav
The order for 1 is chk - sav - rsv
W-AM5A-ACCT-RSV-PMT-FREQ-IND - indicates how the reserve payment will be manage.

XferInfo.description: Xfer Infomration Aggregate.  This aggregate is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

TransactionTypeId.description: No Post Transaction Code for the returned IdaAccount.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

InstructionCode.description: No Post Instruction Code for the returned IdaAccount.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

AcctSeverityCode.description: When the account has reason control, this field contains the highest severity risk. It can be from 1 to 3. Number 1 is the highest risk.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

HoldCode.description: Hold Code for the IdaAccount (if there is a hold).  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

HoldDt.description: Date on which the Hold is placed.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

Amt.description: Amount for which the Hold is posted and the decimal precision is 2.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

HoldAmt.description: Hold Amount Information.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

StopCount.description: The number of stop payments in the account.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

ODLimit.description:
This is a service to allow the account overdrawn until a limit. The OD limit is calculated weekly using several account conditions.
This fields indicates if the account has the service.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CompensatingBal.description: Accounts that have the auto manage code on, will use the compensating balance to determine how funds are separated between sections.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

GrpCd.description: Indicates to which responsible group the account belongs to. Possible values are A, B, C, D, M and U.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

InvestCd.description:
Indicates if the Investment Service is active or not.  Possible values are Y and N.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.
Y: Investment service is active
N: Investment service is NOT active

FormatCd.description: Investment statement format code Possible values are 1, 2.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CloseDt.description: If the account is closed , this date will be populated.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CloseRsn.description: If the account is closed , this Reason code will be populated.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CtrlReasonInfo.description: Control Reason Information Aggregate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

RecModelInfo.description: Periodic Fund transfer information aggregate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

PartyAcctRelRec.description: Tutor/ Gurantor details .  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CourtID.description: Account Court details.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CaseNum.description: Case Number.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CaseType.description: Case Type.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

HighODAmount.description: High OverDraft Amount .  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

HighOverDraftDt.description: Highest overdraft date.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

ODActionCode.description:
Indicates the overdraft default action.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.
Valid Values are,
P-Pay
R-Return
or Emptry string

YTDRtnCount.description: The times of returned items year to date.

YTDPmtCount.description: The times of paid items year to date.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

AcctIntPrefInfo.description: Interest Preference aggregate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

DelinqAging.description: Delinquency Aging Aggregate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

DelinquencyAmt.description: This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry..Reserve accumulated delinquency payment

AnnualSalesCd.description:
Annual sales code.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.
A: Less than $1MM
B: Greater than $1MM and less than $5MM
C: Equal or greater than $5MM and less than $20MM
D: Equal or greater than $20MM and less than $35MM
E: Equal or greater than $35MM and less than $50MM
F: Greater than $50MM

FiscalYr.description: Fiscal year.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

OldIntRate.description: This field is used to establish a reserve interest rate that override the BCF table.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

SPlIntRate.description: This field is used to establish a reserve interest rate that override the BCF table.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

IntRateInfo.description: Interest Rate Information Aggregate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

Aging.description:
This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.. Accepted values in REST are
30 days
60 Days
90 days

Count.description: This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.. Number of times account falls under each deliquency bucket

StatusCode.description: The credit line status.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

Status.description: Status Aggregate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CancelRsnCd.description: The credit line cancel reason.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

InsCd.description: Indicates if the credit line is insure.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

ApprovalDt.description: The credit line approval date.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

Amt.description: The credit line amount.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CollateralCd.description: Credit line collateral code.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

AcctId.description: Credit line collateral account number.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

DepAcctId.description: Depost Accou nt Identifier Aggregate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CollWarrantyCd.description: SBA collateral warranty code.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CollWarrantyInd.description:
SBA collateral warranty indicator.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.
F - Warranty full
P - Partial warranty
U - Unsecured

TempAmt.description: Temporary CL amount.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

TempExpDt.description: Temporary CL expiration date.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

PmtCode.description: Reserve balance payment fraction. Value of zeros means to use the BCF T195 by product.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CancelPmtPlan.description: Contains the cancellation payment plan agreed with the client.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

GuaranteePercent.description: Portion of the credit line amount that is guaranteed.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

AutoRenewInd.description: Business account can have a service for automatic renwe the credi line annually. This fields contains the value for the renwal phases and decisions.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

SBAGroupNo.description: SBA group number.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

SBAExpDt.description: SBA expiration date.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

SBAGroupCd.description: SBA group code number.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CreditLimit.description: Credit Limit Aggregate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

StmtRev.description: Date in which the reserve accounts will be validated for financial revision.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

StmtAvail.description: The balance of the account during the financial revision. Possible values are Y or N.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

FinancialRev.description: Financial revision aggregate. This aggregate is applicable only for IdaAccountInq service

IntDispCd.description:
Instruction on how the interest will be pay.   This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.
N - no interest paid
P - post in interest in the same account
A - Interest will be credited to an affiliated account.

AcctId.description: The account number for the affiliate account.

SectionInd.description:
The account section for the affiliate account.   This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.
C - checking
S - Savings

IntOverInt.description: Establish if the interest will be computed interest over interest.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

PartyAcctRelType.description:
This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry. Relationship type
Supported values in REST are
Tutor
Gurantor

PartyAcctRelCode.description: Tutor Account code.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

PartyAcctRel.description: Party Accoun Relationship Aggregate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

AcctId.description: Gurantor Account Number.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

DepAcctId.description: Deposit Account Identifier Aggregate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

PartyAcctRelInfo.description: Party Account Relationship Information Aggregate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

Phone.description: Gurantor Phone number.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

PhoneNum.description: Phone Number Aggregate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

PostAddr.description: Postal Address Aggregate. This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

Addr1.description: Gurantor Address.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

City.description: Gurantor City.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

PostalCode.description: Gurantor Zip Code.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

ContactInfo.description: Contact Information Aggreagate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

FullName.description: Party relatrionship holder name (Gurantor/Tutor Name).  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

MaxWdrMth.description: Tutor Max Withdrawal Method.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

MaxWdrYear.description: Tutor Max Withdrawal Year.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

MaxWdrLfe.description: Tutor Max Withdrawal Lifetime.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

Freq.description: Service to have a periodic funnd transfer instruction.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry. This field indicates the frequency of the transfer like daily, monthly, etc

Amt.description: Indicates the amount to be periodically transfer.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CurAmt.description: Transfer Amount Aggregate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

SectionInd.description: Indicates the section from which the fubns will be extracted.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

DepAcctIdFrom.description: Deposit Account Identifier-From  Aggreagate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

AcctId.description: The account number to received the transfer funds.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

SectionInd.description: Indicates the section which the funds will be transferred.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

DepAcctIdTo.description: Deposit Account Identifier-To  Aggreagate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

PayDt1.description:
If the frequency is weekly, indicates the day of the transfer (Monday - Friday).  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.
If the frequency is monthly or bi-monthly, indicates the day of the month (01 - 31).

PayDt2.description: Use only for bi-monthly frequency. Indicates the day of the month (01 - 31).  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

ControlReasonID.description: Indicates if the account has a control.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry. There a maximum of 6 control. Control can be established by maintenance or by the system like new accounts or repeated overdraft.

AcctStmtPrefInfo.description: Statement Preference details for the IdaAccount.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

StmtDispCd.description:
Indicate the method the statement will be delivered to the client.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.
E - Electronic
M - Mail
B - Branch copy
U - Unit copy

BranchId.description: Indicate the responsible unit destination for the branch or unit copy.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

StmtUnitBankInfo.description: Statement Unit Bank Information Aggregate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

PostAddr.description: Postal Address Aggregate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

AddrType.description: Indicates the client address to be used in the statement.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

ContactInfo.description: Contact Information Aggregate.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

IncChkImg.description: Indicates if the statmement with will include checks images.   This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

UnCollecItemWaive.description:
Waive indicator for the paid uncollected item.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.
C - charge
W - waive
A - transfer the charge to an affiliate account

VRUChrgWaive.description: Waive indicator for the VRU access charge.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

ChkChrgWaive.description: Waive indicator for the check charge.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

WDlChrgWaive.description: Waive indicator for the withdrawal charge.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

ChkCpyChrgWaive.description: Waive indicator for a check copy charge.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

POSTrnChrgWaive.description: Waive indicator for POS charge.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

ShortStmtChrgWaive.description: Indicates if the short statement charge will be charged or waived.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry. Possible values are W-waived, C- Charge

BundleSvcChrgWaive.description: Waive indicator for bundle service charge.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

ChkDepChrgWaive.description: Waive indicator for check deposit charge.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CoinCurChrgWaive.description: Waive indicator for coin currency change charge.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

DepChrgWaive.description: Waive indicator for deposit charge.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

NightDepChrgWaive.description: Waive indicator for night deposit charge.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

FDICAssmtFeeWaive.description: Waive indicator for FDIC assesement fee.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

STMTCutoffChrgWaive.description: Waive indicator for the special statement cutoff charge.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

STMTPrintChrgWaive.description: Waive indicator for special statement print charge.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

ReDepChkChrgWaive.description: Waive indicator for redeposit a returned deposit charge.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

RetChkChrgWaive.description: Indicates if the returned cheque charge to the unit will be charged or waived.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

SVCChrgWaive.description:
Waive indicator for the account service charges.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.
C - charge
W - waive
A - transfer the charge to an affiliate account

AnnualFeeWaive.description:
Waive indicator for the debit card annual fee.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.
C - charge
W - waive
A - transfer the charge to an affiliate account

ATHAnnualFeeWaive.description:
Waive indicator for the debit card annual fee.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.
C - charge
W - waive
A - transfer the charge to an affiliate account

ATMSVCChrgWaive.description:
Waive indicator for the ATM service charge.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.
C - charge
W - waive
A - transfer the charge to an affiliate account

TransChrgWaive.description: Waive Transaction charges on the account.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

ChrgRsnCd.description: Waive Charges on the account.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

AdtnlStmtCd.description:
Waive Additional Statement Code.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.
C - charge
W - waive
A - transfer the charge to an affiliate account

CYCATHChrgWaive.description: Indicates the number of cycles the Ath was waived.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CYCSVCChrgWaive.description: Indicates the number of cycles the system will waive the service charge.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CYCSVCChrgWaiveCutoff.description: Indicates the number of cycles the system waived the service charge for some promotions.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CYCSVCChrgWaiveRem.description: Indicates the number of cycles left to waive the service charge for some promotions.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

DtPlaced.description: Indicates when the promotion was established.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

SVCPromoInd.description:
Indicates if the account is eligible for service charge promotion rates.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.
Possible values are Y - Account is eligible for promotion rates 
N- Account not eligible for promotion rates

UpDt.description: The date a service charge was placed by the system for certain product.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

WaiveChgDtl.description: Waive chanrge detail aggregate, which gives the waiver information about all fees and charges on the account.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

SavAcctIdTo.description: This aggregate is used to save money in another account by rounding up the posted debits to the dollar. This field conatins the savings account number to be credited. The account can have up to four savings accounts.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

AcctId.description: Savings Acct Number.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

PayoutDt.description: Indicated the date the balance will be transfer to the affiliate/Savings account to be available.

Freq.description: Indicates the payout frequency for the seasonal product.  This field is mandatory only for Idaaccountinquiry.

CycleCode.description: Statement Cycle Code - Check additional documentation

ReturnedMailInd.description: Returned Mail Indicator - Check additional documentation

DelinquencyDPD.description: Delinquency past due days or date

DepAcctRec.description: Represents a summarized version of deposit account information

OwnershipType.description: Ownership Type - PRIMARY - SECONDARY - Check additional documentation

LegalName.description: Legal Name - For Corporate customer  - This Legal Name field is used to send customer name

NAICSCd.description: NAICS Code (North American Industry Classification System)

StartDt.description: Current or Previous Residence Start Date

EndDt.description: Current or Previous Residence End Date

PhoneType.description: Contact Phone Type - Primary - Secondary - Mobile - Check additional documentation

TINType.description: Tax ID Type - Check additional documentation

IdaRates.description: Interest Rates - Returned for IDA Accounts

DepAcctStatusCode.description: Account Status Code - Check additional documentation

BankIdType.description: Required when using Evertec CORE - Check additional documentation

BankId.description: Required when using Evertec CORE - Check additional documentation

BranchId.description: Applicable & Returned - if the channel consuming this service is Ebss

DepAcctMatDt.description: Deposit Account Maturity Date. Only valid for CD accounts.

NextPageNum.description: Returned when using FIS CORE. Return this value while requesting next page.

HasMoreItems.description: Set to true if there more items

TrnDt.description: Returned by FIS CORE - To be deprecated - Mapped to PostedDt

TrnCountryCd.description: Transaction Country Code - WITS UNSD 3-digit code

TrnReasonCd.description: Transaction Reason Code - Check additional documentation

TrnPosted.description: Set to true when the transaction is posted

MerchantCatCd.description: Merchant Category Code - Check additional documentation

Info2.description: Returned by FIS CORE - Transaction return code - <TBD - find where this could be mapped to>

Info4.description: Returned by FIS CORE - Deposit Origination name - <TBD - find where this could be mapped to>

Info6.description: To be deprecated Returned by FIS CORE - Mapped to Effective Date

DepAcctTrnRec.description: Represents a summarized version of deposit account transaction

NextPageNum.description: Returned when using FIS CORE. Return this value while requesting next page.

HasMoreItems.description: Set to true if there more items

DepAcctStmtRec.description: List of Dep Account Statement Record

RecCtrlOut.description: Record Control Out - Returned when using Evertec CORE. Return this value while requesting next page.

DepAcctStmtRec.description: Represents a summarized version of deposit account statement

ChkNumStart.description: If this ChkRange aggregate is used then either ChkNumStart or CheckNumEnd is required

ChkNumEnd.description: If this ChkRange aggregate is used then either ChkNumStart or CheckNumEnd is required

CheckRange.description: Check Range Information    If the channel consuming this service is EBSS, this aggregate is used for sending  the check range    Note - Either use <ChkRange> or <StopChkInfo><ChkNum>, but not both for EBSS    This aggregate is not used when channel is Mibanco,Vru and Commercial

ChkNum.description: Channel = MiBanco,VRU,COMMERCIAL - Always use this field to pass the CheckNumber  When Channel = EBSS,  and has only FIRSTCHKNUM -  this field will be used to pass the CheckNumber

ChkAmt.description: Check amount aggregate. If Channel consuming this service is MiBanco,VRU,COMMERCIAL -  This is a mandatory field to be passed by the channel

OrigDt.description: Check Origination Date. The date on which the customer originates the check.

Requestor.description: Name of person requesting the stop payment.  When the channel consuming this service is Ebss - This field is applicable

WaiveChgCd.description: Waive Charge Code    When the channel consuming this service is Ebss - This field is applicable

MatSus.description: When the channel consuming this service is Ebss - This field is applicable. If the suspect to put the stop payment is by amount or check.

AmtSus.description: When the channel consuming this service is Ebss - This field is applicable

ChkNumSus.description: When the channel consuming this service is Ebss - This field is applicable

RenewalCt.description: Sent by the Channel  Only used for IdaStopPmt - When Channel = EBSS

Desc.description: Description/Reason for Stop Payment  When the channel consuming this service is Ebss - This field is applicable

StopChkInfo.description: Stop Check Information will be sent in this Aggregate  This is used for both StopChkAdd & IdaStopPmt

ApprovalId.description: Approval Identifier.This is an identifier that refers to an  approval event that occurred at the authorizing server.  Returned for both IDAStopPmtMain & TVStopCheckAdd

FeeAmt.description: When used for a fixed amount fee, this is the fixed amount that will be charged

Fee.description: Fee. The fee(s) required to execute the exchange may be  provided to the customer for informational purposes.    Applicable & returned only for TV StopChkAdd (Channel - MiBanco/VRU/Commercial)

EffDt.description: Applicable & returned only for TV StopChkAdd (Channel - MiBanco/VRU/Commercial)

TrnDt.description: Applicable & returned only for TV StopChkAdd (Channel - MiBanco/VRU/Commercial)

FeeAmt.description: When used for a fixed amount fee, this is the fixed amount that will be charged

Fee.description: Fee. The fee(s) required to execute the exchange may be  provided to the customer for informational purposes.    Applicable & returned only for TV StopChkAdd (Channel - MiBanco/VRU/Commercial)

ChkAmt.description: Check amount aggregate.  Applicable & Returned - if the channel consuming this service is Ebss

StopChkInfo.description: Stop Check Information will be sent in this Aggregate

AcctId.description: Applicable & Returned - if the channel consuming this service is Ebss

AcctClassCd.description: Account Class Code - Check additional documentation

DepAcctId.description: Deposit Account Identification Aggregate.  Applicable & Returned - if the channel consuming this service is Ebss

StopChkStatusCode.description: Stop Check Status Code. The status of a Stop Check request that is returned as part of a Stop Check inquiry.  Applicable & Returned - if the channel consuming this service is Ebss

ChkAmt.description: Check amount aggregate.  Applicable & Returned - if the channel consuming this service is Ebss

ChkNumEnd.description: Last check number for stop payment

OrigDt.description: Check Origination Date. The date on which the customer originates the check.

NumDays.description: umber of days hold is placed previously.

Requestor.description: Requestor who placed the stop payment

WaiveChgCd.description: Waive Charge Code - Check additional documentation

AmtSus.description: This field is applicable when check amount is under suspect. This field is for future use and its a bit value and not amount field

ChkNumSus.description: Check number under suspect. This field is for future use

MatSus.description: If the suspect to put the stop payment is by amount or check. This field is for future use

ExtBundleCd.description: Indicates if the account has bundle service or not in external transactions - Check additional documentation

IntBundleCd.description: Indicates if the account has bundle service or not in internal transactions - Check additional documentation

OperId.description: Operator ID and it a default field. This field is for future use

PostDtInd.description: Means the stop is placed after the posted date - Check additional documentation

RecFlg.description: If the stop payment history needs to be purged or not - Check additional documentation

RecType.description: This is the code set so that IDA will fetch the corresponding record from the database

TypCd.description: This field is for future use

Tanmm.description: Current minutes. This field is for future use

TanSeq.description: This field is set to 7 for updating the stops in the online B24 file. This field is for future use

Tanss.description: This field is set to 7 for updating the stops in the online B24 file. This field is for future use

TrfInd.description: Transfer indicator. Possible values are - Y/N

RenewalCt.description: Renewal Counter  Applicable & Returned - if the channel consuming this service is Ebss

CreatedDt.description: Created Date/Time. The date/time the object was created  Applicable & Returned - if the channel consuming this service is Ebss

CreateRefId.description: Approval Identifier.This is an identifier that refers to an  approval event that occurred at the authorizing server  This field will display the id that has been generated during Stopcheck Add

LastRenDt.description: Last Renewal Date  This Date will be populated if RenwalCT is set to a non-zero value  YYYY-MM-DD

NextRenDt.description: Next Renewal Date  This Date will be populated if RenwalCT is set to a non-zero value  YYYY-MM-DD

OrigBranch.description: Applicable & Returned - if the channel consuming this service is Ebss

Updt.description: Applicable & Returned - if the channel consuming this service is Ebss. Format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ which is Date Time in UTC

StopChkInfo.description: List Stop Check Information will be sent in this Aggregate

CertDepAcctStatusCode.description: CD account status code - Check additional documentation

ReturnedMailInd.description: Return mail indicator - Check additional documentation

ESignAction.description: ESignAction to be sent as "Sign" by channel

ESignedDt.description: Date on which Esign agreement has been captured

NumDays.description: Number of days for Interest calculation

CurAmt.description: Represents the adjustment amount that is to be posted for an account ID. Channel needs to pass the value.

AdjInd.description: Adjustment indicator to indicate whether adjustment is Debit (DB) or Credit (CR)

AdjDate.description: Date on which adjustment is made. Always accepts current Date

TransactionTypeId.description: Indicates the type of transactions to be restricted like 1-Debit Only , 2 - Credit Only, 3 - All txn, 4- Check txn

InstructionCode.description:
Captures the instructions for the next step when payment posting fails due to control placed on the account.
1 RETURN, CLOSED ACCOUNT
2 REFER ALL CHECKS TO BR. MGR
3 REFER ALL DEBITS TO BR. MGR
4 REFER ALL DEPOSITS TO BR. MGR
5 REFER ALL CREDITS TO BR. MGR

ControlReasonId.description: Captures the control reason code to be added to the account. - Check additional documentation

ControlReasonDesc1.description: Additional field to capture the remarks for adding control reason.

ControlReasonDesc2.description: Additional field to capture the remarks for adding control reason.

PostedDt.description:
Transaction Posted Date
For transfers/Deposit , the date on
which the entries were made on the books of the receiving
Financial Institution.

RefId.description: Approval Identifier.This is an identifier that refers to an  approval event that occurred at the authorizing server.

RefInfo.description: Carries StopCheck Reversal Refernce number & details

PostedDt.description:
Transaction Posted Date
For transfers/Deposit , the date on
which the entries were made on the books of the receiving
Financial Institution.

HasMoreItems.description: Set to true if there more items

TranCd.description:
Transaction code that needs to be sent by the channel
Accepted Transaction code is "242"

StmtDispCd.description:
Indicate the method the statement will be delivered to the client.
E - Electronic
M - Mail
B - Branch copy
U - Unit copy

StmtDispSection.description: Statement Disposition section. Values are between 1 and 4

BranchId.description: Indicate the responsible unit destination for the branch or unit copy

IncChkImg.description:
Indicates if the statmement with will include checks images.
Accepted values are "Y" or "N"

AcctId.description: The affiliated account to be credited

AcctType.description: The affiliated account section to be credited. 'C' checking, 'S' Savings for the query coming from both the channel MIBANCO and EBSS

IntDispCd.description: For channel EBSS The Valid Value for the field DispCd are as follows: NoInterestPaid PostToAccount PostToAffiliatedAccount Check None Other For channel MIBANCO The Valid Value for the field  DispCd are as follows: A D For channel is MIBANCO for DispCd field we expect the value as A and D  When the channel is EBSS for Dispcd the value expected is PostToAffliatedAccount

PayOutDt.description: The payout date to transfer the whole balance to the affiliated account.

Freq.description: The Valid values when the channel is MIBANCO are as follows A or D Whenereas the Valid values when the channel is EBSS are as follows Annual FutureDate When the channel is MIBANCO for payOutFreq field we expect the value as A or D and  When the channel is EBSS for payOutFreq the value expected is Annual or Future date

HoldDt.description: Date when hold is placed on the account

HoldEnterDt.description: Date when hold is entered on the account

HoldTime.description: Time when hold is placed on the account

Officer.description: This is usually the officer number but also is used with a fixed value to identify if the hold was placed by the system.

CheckingAmt.description: Use for deposit account except savings

OrigId.description: Used to identify the origin of the transaction.

TrnInd.description: Alwayss 'D'. D  =  DEBIT CARD TRANSACTION, DURING HOURS

HoldExtend.description: The ADMIN hold is active for 24 hrs by default but it can be extended to an additional 24 hrs by setting 'Y' in this field. Valid values would Y or N

HoldProcessInd.description: The process originating the hold.  VALUE '1' = NSF process VALUE '2'   Unposted process VALUE '3'   HOLD-STP-APPL VALUE '4'   Corporate process VALUE '5'   Telepago application VALUE '6'   Wire Transfer application VALUE '7'   Manual hold VALUE '8'   Web cash application

TandemInd.description: Value always Y to update Tandem System

TranCd.description:
Transaction code that needs to be sent by the channel
Accepted Transaction code is "242"

StmtDispCd.description:
Indicate the method the statement will be delivered to the client.
E - Electronic
M - Mail
B - Branch copy
U - Unit copy

StmtDispSection.description: Statement Disposition section. Values are between 1 and 4

BranchId.description: Indicate the responsible unit destination for the branch or unit copy

IncChkImg.description:
Indicates if the statmement with will include checks images.
Accepted values are "Y" or "N"

CIFAcctId.description: This number should be the CIS customer number.

AcctType.description: Account type code determine the deposit product to be opened.

DocTypCd.description: Indicates the statement type like paper, electronic.

OfficerNo.description: Need to be the officer number opening the account.

InsInd.description: If should be Y or N. Indicates if the account has an insurance associated.

AcctEntitycode.description: Account entity code is from CIS. All possible values are 001 for retail/indiv, 002- partnership,003 - corporations, 004- limited corporation, 005- associations,006-government, 007- banks,008-Non Profit Organisation, 009-trade name, 010- successions, 011- trust, 012 - special partnership,013- FHMA accounts,

HoldDt.description: Date when hold is placed on the account

HoldEnterDt.description: Date when hold is entered on the account

HoldTime.description: Time when hold is placed on the account

HoldEnteredDt.description: Date when hold details are entered on the account.

BranchId.description: Branch number where the hold is placed

OrigId.description: Application which originated the hold. 1=ADMINISTRATIVE SYSTEM

HoldExtend.description: The ADMIN hold is active for 24 hrs by default but it can be extended to an additioonal 24 hrs by setting 'Y' in this field.

TrnInd.description: Alwayss 'D'. D  =  DEBIT CARD TRANSACTION, DURING HOURS

MasterFileInd.description: Used to specified if the master file should be updated.

HoldProcessInd.description: The process originating the hold.  VALUE '1' = NSF process VALUE '2'   Unposted process VALUE '3'   HOLD-STP-APPL VALUE '4'   Corporate process VALUE '5'   Telepago application VALUE '6'   Wire Transfer application VALUE '7'   Manual hold VALUE '8'   Web cash application

HoldReasonType.description: Reason for the Hold-List Of Reason Codes given

AvailDays1.description: Number of days when funds will be available in case RegCC Hold

AvailDays2.description: Number of days when funds will be available in case of other Holds

HoldDays.description: Number of days hold placed on the account

HoldType.description: Type of Hold. Like 210-DEPOSITED CHECK HOLD CHECKING

HoldRule.description:
It contains the Regcc regulation rule to be applied for deposited checks. Only holds types related to deposits has values.
R  Regcc
D  Delay
A- Availability

TandemInd.description: Used to update the Tandem Sytem. Value Is Always "Y"

example.message: A client is forbidden from accessing a valid URL.
Too many requests in a given amount of time
Error occured while retriving FIS Products

x-api-key.name: x-api-key
x-api-key.description: Secure API Authorization Key, assigned to channel.

x-client-traceid.name: x-client-traceid
x-client-traceid.description: x-client-traceid is used to search all traces and join spans for a single request.

x-AuthToken.name: x-AuthToken
x-AuthToken.description: x-AuthToken is used to call evertec apis as part of authorization.

x-AuthType.name: x-AuthType
x-AuthType.description: Required when using Evertec CORE - Determines SignOn statergy.  This parameter is optional for AppCode viz. WCR, WCR_Console, PICS, CLJ and MIBANCO

x-AuthCredentials.name: x-AuthCredentials
x-AuthCredentials.description: Required when using Evertec CORE - Typically combination of userId and password with colon separator between them or accountId, accountType and SSN. . This parameter is optional for AppCode viz. WCR, WCR_Console, PICS and CLJ. For MIBANCO, it would be colon separated accountId, accountType and SSN.

BankId.name: BankId
BankId.description: Required when using Evertec CORE - Check additional documentation

BankIdType.name: BankIdType
BankIdType.description: Required when using Evertec CORE - Check additional documentation

RecCountLimit.name: RecCountLimit
RecCountLimit.description: When the response should be paginated, the number of records to return, RecCountLimit between 1 and 50.

Sort.name: Sort
Sort.description: Indicates whether to sort the returned collection and if so, sort order

IncDetail.name: IncDetail
IncDetail.description: Indicates a flag to include transaction records for a statement

ChkNumStart.name: ChkNumStart
ChkNumStart.description: When Start OR end check number /both can be present

ChkNumEnd.name: ChkNumEnd
ChkNumEnd.description: Start OR end check number /both can be present

schema.description: Customer perm id, which is a sensitive customer identifier.Either `CustPermId` or `CustLoginId` must be returned in the response.  example: '1000151'
Customer password. TODO - Define algorithm to encrypt

DepAcctType.name: DepAcctType
DepAcctType.description: Required when connecting to Evertec CORE

DepAcctSectionInd.name: DepAcctSectionInd
DepAcctSectionInd.description:
Required when connecting to Evertec CORE. Section indicator. This can take the following values
    * C (Checking)
    * S (Savings)
    * R (Reserve)

schema.example: DAO_PB, DAO_PD, WCR, WCR_Console, PCAS, MIBANCO, IVR, PICS, CLJ

LastStmtDt.name: LastStmtDt
LastStmtDt.description: Last Statement Date. This behaves as an identifier for the latest statement.

EndDt.name: EndDt
EndDt.description: End Date - When EndDt is provided StartDt is required

PageNumber.name: PageNumber
PageNumber.description: The number of page to request, start with 1

CardNumber.name: CardNumber
CardNumber.description: Debit Card Number which needs to be activated/retrieved.

CardPIN.name: CardPIN
CardPIN.description: Debit Card PIN which will be used for activation.

CDAAcctType.name: CDAAcctType
CDAAcctType.description: Required when connecting to Evertec CORE

ChkNum.name: ChkNum
ChkNum.description: This Parameter is used for searching a specific check number (Single check number)Note - Either CheckRange or CheckNumber needs to be used, not both

CreateRefId.name: CreateRefId
CreateRefId.description: Approval ID /Refernce No. generated for StopCHkAdd

Requestor.name: Requestor
Requestor.description: Name of person requesting the stop payment.

WaiveChgCd.name: WaiveChgCd
WaiveChgCd.description: Waive Charge code Sample values are Spaces,"W",etc..

RenewalCt.name: RenewalCt
RenewalCt.description: Renewal counter  If given with a valid value , Renewal Date will be returned in the resposne

Desc.name: Desc
Desc.description: Reason given during the STOP check was placed

OrigDt.name: OrigDt
OrigDt.description: Check Origination Date. The date on which the customer  originates the check.

x-idem-key.name: x-idem-key
x-idem-key.description: Unique key allowing clinet to make same call repeatedly while producing the same result.

TrnOwnerFuncCd.name: TrnOwnerFuncCd
TrnOwnerFuncCd.description: Function code - which backend program has been called in the backend Sent by Channel

TrnOwnerSubFuncCd.name: TrnOwnerSubFuncCd
TrnOwnerSubFuncCd.description: Sub- Function code - which Sub-function has been called in the backend Sent by Channel

ControlReasonId.name: ControlReasonId
ControlReasonId.description: Control reason id to be removed from an account

ControlReasonOccurance.name: ControlReasonOccurance
ControlReasonOccurance.description: Valid occurance of the control reason that needs to be removed.

StopCheckRefId.name: StopCheckRefId
StopCheckRefId.description: Reference Id - when the Stop Payment is added

PrefMessageStatusCd.name: PrefMessageStatusCd
PrefMessageStatusCd.description: IDA Statement Preference Message send/receive Code. Possible values to be sent by the channel are 01 - Send and 00 - Receive

HoldReferenceId.name: HoldReferenceId
HoldReferenceId.description: Transaction component number or Hold Reference Number when hold was placed in past.

OfficerId.name: OfficerId
OfficerId.description: This is usually the officer number but also is used with a fixed value to identify if the hold was placed by the system.

AuthAgentId.name: AuthAgentId
AuthAgentId.description: User Id of the person authorizing the transaction

AssistanceCodeId.name: AssistanceCodeId
AssistanceCodeId.description: Assistance Code Id - Used to assign the Fraud responsible team
